name: What is Linux
description: Linux is the backbone of many cloud environments. Understanding what it is and why it matters is essential for cloud engineering.

learning_steps.title: What is Linux
learning_steps.description: This video introduces Linux and explains why it's so important in the tech industry, especially for cloud computing.

learning_steps.title: What is Linux?
learning_steps.description: A quick overview of Linux, its history, and why it powers most of the internet.

learning_steps.title: Popular Linux Distributions
learning_steps.description: Learn about Ubuntu, CentOS, Debian, and other popular distributions used in cloud environments.

questions.prompt: Walk me through what Linux is and why it dominates cloud server environments.
How would you explain a Linux distribution to a colleague, and which ones are commonly used in cloud environments?

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what Linux is and why it's important for cloud computing?

learning_objectives.text: Understand what Linux is and why it powers cloud infrastructure
Know the differences between popular Linux distributions
